entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
